description: Celebrate the&nbsp;holidays grandly with this Sparkling Holiday Punch recipe! With a wide variety of ingredients that bring flavors and textures to this festive drink, it will surely be the star of your next party!
name: Sparkling Holiday Punch
recipeIngredient: 24 oz. Double-strength cold brewed English breakfast tea
12 Lemon wheels and fig slices for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: In a saucepan over low heat, combine 24 ounces of double-strength cold-brewed English breakfast tea, 12 chopped fresh figs, and 3 cups granulated sugar. Stir until the sugar melts.
